title: Smoke and CO Detectors Got Smart
description: A 60-second lesson on Smoke and CO Detectors Got Smart.

hook.text: A traditional alarm screams the same for burnt toast and real fire. A smart detector names the room and danger type.

buildup.text: Nest Protect uses split-spectrum sensors to tell fast-flaming fires from slow-smoldering onesâ€”critical differences.

discovery.text: They push alerts naming the threat and room: 'Carbon monoxide in the basement.' No guessing during a crisis.

twist.text: Smart detectors test themselves automatically and alert you when batteries are lowâ€”no more 3 AM low-battery chirps.

climax.text: Linked smart detectors trigger alarms in every room at once. Hearing the alert in a distant bedroom saves lives.

punchline.text: Same alarm, smarter information, saved lives.

quiz.question: What advantage do smart smoke detectors have over traditional ones?
options: They tell you the specific danger type and room location via phone
They spray fire suppressant automatically when triggered
They are 10x more sensitive to smoke particles
